title: Cauliflower Lahmacun With Sumac-Spiced Onions and Yogurt
sub_head: Minced and roasted, cauliflower becomes succulent and deeply savory. It makes a terrific veggie alternative to the minced beef or lamb that typically tops a Turkish lahmacun.
body: To explore and search through all our recipes, check out the new WSJ Recipes page.
